> Hello, did I miss something while I was in the hospital? I didn't
think

To clarify....I'm not selling this, I just forwarded it from one of
the newsletters I get because I thought people on this list might be
interested. There was a thread a while back about cleanup. -Amalia-

Then you will absolutely love BOX-4-BLOX!!! Devised by a

that not only STORES but also SORTS Legos. At long last, no
more blocks spread all over the floor!

Now available in the U.S., exclusively on the Internet.
